title: Indian WWI Troops Praying Image MCQ 1

content.prompt: The photograph best illustrates which aspect of population movements in the late nineteenth and early twentieth centuries?

choices.label: They often involved the spread of cultural traditions into new locations.
They were often undertaken to displace labor force lost to war or disease.
They often resulted in the decline or disappearance of native religious traditions.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
